title: New Program Aims To Give Low Income Families Access To Clean Energy & Efficiency
text:
12 New Program Aims To Give Low Income Families Access To Clean Energy & Efficiency 
Clean Technica: In June, RMI—along with its partner organizations—launched eLab Leap in New York to identify the unmet needs and create solutions that empower and improve the lives of low-income communities and households in a clean energy future.
